statements: SELECT * FROM game_progress;
SELECT player_id, last_saved_at FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, save_state FROM game_progress WHERE last_saved_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, last_saved_at FROM game_progress ORDER BY last_saved_at DESC;
SELECT player_id, last_saved_at FROM game_progress WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, last_saved_at FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, save_state FROM game_progress ORDER BY last_saved_at DESC;
SELECT player_id, last_saved_at, save_state FROM game_progress WHERE last_saved_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, save_state FROM game_progress WHERE player_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, player_id FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT saved_data FROM save_states WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM game_progress WHERE game_id = 123;
SELECT save_id FROM save_states WHERE player_id = 4;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM game_progress WHERE game_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, save_id, saved_data FROM save_states WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM game_progress WHERE game_id > 5 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM game_progress JOIN save_states ON game_progress.player_id = save_states.player_id WHERE save_states.save_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, level FROM player WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT game_name, genre, total_players FROM game ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, timestamp FROM player JOIN save_state ON player.player_id = save_state.player_id;
SELECT player_name, level, state FROM player JOIN save_state ON player.player_id = save_state.player_id WHERE game_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM player WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, progress FROM player WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY level ASC;
SELECT player.player_name, game.game_name, save_state.timestamp FROM player JOIN save_state ON player.player_id = save_state.player_id JOIN game ON save_state.game_id = game.game_id;
SELECT player.player_name, game.genre FROM player, game, save_state WHERE player.player_id = save_state.player_id AND game.game_id = save_state.game_id AND player.level > 3;

SELECT player.player_name, count(game.game_id) AS total_games_played FROM player LEFT JOIN save_state ON player.player_id = save_state.player_id LEFT JOIN game ON save_state.game_id = game.game_id GROUP BY player.player_name;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_progress FROM player ORDER BY game_progress DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM game WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_id, playtime FROM player_game ORDER BY player_id, playtime DESC;

SELECT player.player_name, game.game_name, leaderboard.score FROM player JOIN leaderboard ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id JOIN game ON leaderboard.game_id = game.game_id WHERE leaderboard.rank <= 10;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_progress FROM player ORDER BY game_progress DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_name, release_date FROM player JOIN player_game ON player.player_id = player_game.player_id JOIN game ON player_game.game_id = game.game_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_name, playtime FROM player JOIN player_game ON player.player_id = player_game.player_id JOIN game ON player_game.game_id = game.game_id WHERE playtime > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_name, score FROM player JOIN leaderboard ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id JOIN game ON leaderboard.game_id = game.game_id ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, level, coins FROM player WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_name, coins FROM player ORDER BY coins DESC;
SELECT * FROM game WHERE platform = 'PC';
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM game ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, level FROM player WHERE coins > 100 ORDER BY level DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE total_playtime > 500 ORDER BY highest_level DESC;
SELECT p.player_name, g.game_name, s.progress FROM player p JOIN save_state s ON p.id = s.player_id JOIN game g ON s.game_id = g.game_id WHERE s.save_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT pi.player_id, pi.item_name, pi.quantity, p.player_name FROM player_inventory pi JOIN player p ON pi.player_id = p.id WHERE pi.quantity > 0 ORDER BY pi.quantity DESC;

SELECT player_name, total_playtime, highest_level, coins_collected FROM player_statistics ps JOIN player p ON ps.player_id = p.id WHERE ps.highest_level > 10 OR ps.coins_collected > 500 ORDER BY coins_collected DESC, highest_level DESC, total_playtime DESC;
